top_comment.text:
I've been best friends with the most amazing person ever since I was 3. 
So, for 10 years now, going one 11! We both moved away to opposite ends of 
the planet when we were 6 and then I moved back to our old home a year 
after that. Two years later, she moved back too. We just clicked again and 
it was like we'd just grown up knowing each other even though we hadn't 
seen each other in 3 years. Then, about six months ago, I moved away again. 
I could relate to this video so, so much…but, I'm moving back in six months 
and I know that we'll still be best friends because we've always made it 
work.
   Thank you Aleta for being the most amazing friend anyone could ever ask 
for!﻿
top_comment.author: Liv'sLife

top_comment.text:
I'm so nervous right now bc I'm moving to Canada few months later but I 
can't tell my friends yet until I get my official VISA. I'm dying of guilt 
and I keep having to lie to my best friends when she talks about how 
exciting will our next semester be even though I won't be here then. I'm 
worried that she'll feel betrayed when I tell her later. HELP﻿
top_comment.author: Shelly Bahng

comments.text:

I leave. I'll probably tell when my VISA comes out which is about a month 
before I leave. But it takes forever to get the VISA and meanwhile I'm 
dyingTT

comments.text:
